# Botanist SOP
[bold]1.[/bold] Botanists are permitted to grow experimental plants, presuming they [bold]do not distribute it[/bold] without the express permission of the [color=#1b67a5]Head of Personnel[/color].
[bold]2.[/bold] Botanists must provide the [color=#9fed58]Chef[/color] with adequate Botanical Supplies, per the [color=#9fed58]Chef[/color]â€™s request, free of charge.
[bold]3.[/bold] Botanists are [bold]not[/bold] permitted to cause unregulated plantlife to spread outside of Hydroponics or other such designated locations without express permission of the [color=#1b67a5]Head of Personnel[/color] or [color=#1b67a5]Captain[/color].
[bold]4.[/bold] Botanists are [bold]not[/bold] permitted to hand out spatially unstable botanical supplies to non-botanist personnel.
[bold]5.[/bold] Botanists are [bold]not[/bold] permitted to harvest or hand out Amanitin or other such plant/fungi-derived poisons, unless specifically requested by the Head of Security and/or [color=#1b67a5]Captain.
[bold]6.[/bold] Botanists are [bold]not[/bold] permitted the use of a chemical dispenser without the express permission of the [color=#c96dbf]Research Director[/color] [italicize]and[/italicize] [color=#1b67a5]Head of Personnel[/color].
[bold]7.[/bold] Botanists are [bold]not[/bold] permitted to carry dangerous plantlife outside Botany, or allow such plantlife to affect outside of Botany.
